resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108608</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108608</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201544</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Equation Grapher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung Grapher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équation Grapher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equação Grapher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equazione Grapher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξίσωση Grapher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ecuación Grapher</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learn about graphing polynomials. The shape of the curve changes as the constants are adjusted. View the curves for the individual terms (e.g. y=bx ) to see how they add to generate the polynomial curve.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie über die graphischee Darstellung von
von Polynomen. Die Form der Kurve ändert, während die 
Konstanten justiert werden. Sehen Sie die Kurven für die 
einzelnen Bezeichnungen (z.B. y=bx) an um zu sehen wie sie 
hinzufügen, um die polynomische Kurve festzulegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Renseignez-vous sur représenter graphiquement des
polynômes. La forme de la courbe change pendant que les 
constantes sont ajustées. Visualisez les courbes pour les 
différentes limites (par exemple y=bx) pour voir comment elles 
ajoutent pour produire de la courbe polynôme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda sobre representar graficamente 
polynomials. A forma da curva muda enquanto as constantes são 
ajustadas. Veja as curvas para os termos individuais (por 
exemplo y=bx) para ver como adicionam para gerar a curva polynomial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impari circa rappresentare graficamente i 
polinomi. La figura della curva cambia mentre i costanti sono 
registrati. Osservi le curve per i diversi termini (per esempio 
y=bx) per vedere come aggiungono per generare la curva polinomiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε για να δώσει με γραφική παράσταση τα 
πολυώνυμα. Η μορφή των αλλαγών καμπυλών ως σταθερές 
ρυθμίζεται. Εμφανίστε τις καμπύλες για τους μεμονωμένους 
όρους (π.χ. y=bx) για να δείτε πώς προσθέτουν για να 
παραγάγουν την πολυωνυμική καμπύλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda sobre la representación gráfica de 
polinomios gra'ficamente. La dimensión de una variable de la 
curva cambia mientras que se ajustan las constantes. Opinión 
las curvas para los términos individuales (e.g. y=bx) para ver cómo 
agregan para generar la curva polinómica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201544</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108608</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/equation-grapher</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
